text: "Telegram Sam" is a 1972 song by glam rock band T. Rex. It was taken from their seventh studio album The Slider. It went to number 1 in the United Kingdom and Ireland, number 4 in Germany and Switzerland, number 6 in Norway, number 20 in Australia, number 26 in the Netherlands, number 27 in France, number 35 in New Zealand, number 66 in Canada and number 67 in the United States. ==Bauhaus version== In 1980, English gothic rock band Bauhaus covered Telegram Sam as their fourth single. It went to number 12 in New Zealand. ==Track listings== ;7" Side A: #"Telegram Sam" - 2:08 Side B: #"Crowds" - 3:13 ;12" Side A: #"Telegram Sam" - 2:08 Side B: #"Rosegarden Funeral of Sores" - 5:31 #"Crowds" - 3:13 ==Notes== Category:1972 songs Category:T. Rex (band) songs Category:Bauhaus (band) songs Category:Glam rock songs
title: Telegram Sam
